main_definition: Seven is a numerical value representing the quantity following 'six' and preceding 'eight', also used as an idiom to indicate completeness or perfection.

meanings_and_examples.example: There are seven days in a week.
It's said that God created the world in six days and rested on the seventh, symbolizing completion and perfection.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A week consisting of seven days
meanings_and_examples.example: I will start my new diet next Monday, which is a fresh start of seven days.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The seventh item in a series or sequence
meanings_and_examples.example: In the first seven games, he scored no points; however, in the eighth game, he made his mark with 10 points.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to the biblical creation story as a symbol of completion and perfection
meanings_and_examples.example: The artist completed his masterpiece on the seventh try, embodying the notion of completeness.
